monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Player can ride the Monster - Breaks hidden walls - Destroys diamond blocks
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, it gains a Shield equal to 5% of its Maximum Health and 1 Charge stack.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Unique Aura: Bleed stacks on enemies are not removed when they take Bleed damage.

skills.name: Ancient Predation
skills.description: Aura: Allied Ancient Monsters start combat with a Predation and an Age stack.

skills.name: Anti Cascade
skills.description: Reduces enemy damage by 3% for every consecutive hit. (1st hit: 0% reduction, 2nd hit: 3% reduction, 3rd hit: 6% reduction)

skills.name: Armor Bypass
skills.description: This Monster's attacks ignore 20% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Armor Up
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (750 + 75% Defense) Applies Barrier & Glory (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Attack Mastery
skills.description: Every physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Bleed Out
skills.description: Unique Aura: Bleed stacks on enemies are not removed when they take Bleed damage.

skills.name: Blinding Sparks
skills.description: Unique Aura: There is a chance to apply Blind to enemies when they take Burn damage (40%) or Shock damage (20%).

skills.name: Burning Charge
skills.description: 1 x 125% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Burning Charge Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Burning Charge Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Burning Charge Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Carnage
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies - Heal all allies for (500 + 150% Attack)

skills.name: Claws
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 130% (390%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 120% (480%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Heat
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Death Blow
skills.description: Deals 5% increased damage for each Debuff on the target.

skills.name: Deep Wounds
skills.description: Aura: Bleed damage on enemies is increased by 40%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Divine Shield
skills.description: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, it gains a Shield equal to 5% of its Maximum Health and 1 Charge stack.

skills.name: Earth Allegiance
skills.description: Converts the element of all Neutral attacks to Earth. Earth attacks ignore Earth resistance.

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fireclaws
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Glorious Spark
skills.description: Unique Aura: Allied Monsters with Glory trigger an additional 40% damage hit. Additional stacks of Glory increase the damage by an additional 20%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hunt
skills.description: Aura: Increases the Critical Chance of the whole party by 4%.

skills.name: Igniting Stings
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Infernal Roar
skills.description: Aura: Critical Hits of allied Monsters have a 7.5% chance to apply Burn or Shock.

skills.name: Lava Stream
skills.description: 7 x 75% (525%) physical damage (fire) cannot be dodged every hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magical Weakness
skills.description: Magical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 21. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Multi Burn
skills.description: Aura: Burn (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Glory
skills.description: Aura: Glory (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Physical Resistance
skills.description: Physical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Power Focus
skills.description: Shield self for 4 x (50 + 20% Attack) Increases the damage of the next attack by 15% for every ally that acted this turn (including self).

skills.name: Power Focus Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield self for 5 x (50 + 20% Attack) Increases the damage of the next attack by 18% for every ally that acted this turn (including self).

skills.name: Power Focus Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield self for 6 x (50 + 20% Attack) Increases the damage of the next attack by 20% for every ally that acted this turn (including self).

skills.name: Power Focus Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield self for 7 x (50 + 20% Attack) Increases the damage of the next attack by 22% for every ally that acted this turn (including self).

skills.name: Power Focus Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield self for 8 x (50 + 20% Attack) Increases the damage of the next attack by 25% for every ally that acted this turn (including self).

skills.name: Predation
skills.description: When this Monster spends a turn without attacking, it gains a Predation stack.

skills.name: Recuperate
skills.description: Critical Hits regenerate 7 Mana.

skills.name: Seismic Shocks
skills.description: Every Earth attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Shock.

skills.name: Severe Cuts
skills.description: 6 x 65% (390%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Severe Cuts Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Shared Glory
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Glory (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Glory.

skills.name: Shred
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Shred Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +60%

skills.name: Shred Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 135% (270%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +70%

skills.name: Vicious
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 40% chance to gain Glory (Buff).

drops.name: Craft Box
drops.description: Consume to get random craft materials based on Keeper Rank.
